comments:
Build 20020820 + latest CVS as of 20020823

I was doing some stepping, when a pop-up appeared stating that there'd been an 
error. Afterwards, my variables view said "Thread not suspended, stack frame 
unavailable," every time I stepped. The following was in the log:

We debugged this and found that the problem is caused by static field 
variables. JDIVariable.hashCode() calls fObject.hashCode(), but fObject is 
null for static fields.
The same problem existed in JDIFieldVariable.equals()
